verses.verse: וַ֠יָּשָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned יְהוֹשָׁפָ֨ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יְהוּדָ֧ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֛וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house בְּשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace לִֽירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פָּנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> to meet יֵה֣וּא <S%H3058><s%> And Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲנָ֘נִי֮ <S%H2607><s%> of Hanani הַחֹזֶה֒ <S%H2374><s%> the seer וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> him and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to king יְהוֹשָׁפָ֔ט <S%H3092><s%> Jehoshaphat הֲלָרָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> the ungodly לַעְזֹ֔ר <S%H5826><s%> Shouldest thou help וּלְשֹׂנְאֵ֥י <S%H8130><s%> them that hate יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תֶּאֱהָ֑ב <S%H157><s%> and love וּבָזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and קֶּ֔צֶף <S%H7110><s%> [is] wrath מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> upon thee from before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אֲבָ֕ל <S%H61><s%> Nevertheless דְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> things טוֹבִ֖ים <S%H2896><s%> there are good נִמְצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> found עִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בִעַ֤רְתָּ <S%H1197><s%> in thee in that thou hast taken away הָאֲשֵׁרוֹת֙ <S%H842><s%> the groves מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land וַהֲכִינ֥וֹתָ <S%H3559><s%> and hast prepared לְבָבְךָ֖ <S%H3824><s%> thine heart לִדְרֹ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> to seek הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H3092><s%> And Jehoshaphat בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem ס וַיָּ֜שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> again וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> and he went out בָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> through the people מִבְּאֵ֥ר שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <S%H884><s%> from Beersheba עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> to mount אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim וַיְשִׁיבֵ֕ם <S%H7725><s%> and brought them back אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <S%H5975><s%> And he set שֹֽׁפְטִ֜ים <S%H8199><s%> judges בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> throughout all the fenced לְעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city וָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> by city

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשֹּֽׁפְטִ֗ים <S%H8199><s%> to the judges רְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> Take heed מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹשִׂ֔ים <S%H6213><s%> what ye do כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> for לְאָדָ֛ם <S%H120><s%> not for man תִּשְׁפְּט֖וּ <S%H8199><s%> for ye judge כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> but for the LORD וְעִמָּכֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> you בִּדְבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> render מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> let פַֽחַד־ <S%H6343><s%> Wherefore now let the fear יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and שִׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> be upon you take heed וַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֞ין <S%H369><s%> will have עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God עַוְלָ֛ה <S%H5766><s%> [it] for [there is] no iniquity וּמַשֹּׂ֥א <S%H4856><s%> nor respect פָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> of persons וּמִקַּח־ <S%H4727><s%> nor taking שֹֽׁחַד׃ <S%H7810><s%> of gifts

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also בִּ֠ירוּשָׁלִַם <S%H3389><s%> Moreover in Jerusalem הֶעֱמִ֨יד <S%H5975><s%> set יְהוֹשָׁפָ֜ט <S%H3092><s%> did Jehoshaphat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַלְוִיִּ֣ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> and [of] the priests וּמֵרָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> and of the chief הָאָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> for the judgment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלָרִ֑יב <S%H7379><s%> and for controversies וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> when they returned יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> And he charged עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> them saying כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus תַעֲשׂוּן֙ <S%H6213><s%> Thus shall ye do בְּיִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> in the fear יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֶּאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> faithfully וּבְלֵבָ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> heart שָׁלֵֽם׃ <S%H8003><s%> and with a perfect

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any רִיב֩ <S%H7379><s%> And what cause אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whenever יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> soever shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> unto מֵאֲחֵיכֶ֣ם ׀ <S%H251><s%> to you of your brethren הַיֹּשְׁבִ֣ים <S%H3427><s%> that dwell בְּעָרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5892><s%> in their cities בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between דָּ֣ם ׀ <S%H1818><s%> between blood לְדָם֮ <S%H1818><s%> and blood בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between תּוֹרָ֣ה <S%H8451><s%> between law לְמִצְוָה֮ <S%H4687><s%> and commandment לְחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> statutes וּלְמִשְׁפָּטִים֒ <S%H4941><s%> and judgments וְהִזְהַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H2094><s%> ye shall even warn אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> so יֶאְשְׁמוּ֙ <S%H816><s%> them that they trespass לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> not against the LORD וְהָֽיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> may come קֶ֥צֶף <S%H7110><s%> and [so] wrath עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֲחֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> come upon you and upon your brethren כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> this תַעֲשׂ֖וּן <S%H6213><s%> do וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> so תֶאְשָֽׁמוּ׃ <S%H816><s%> and ye shall not trespass

וְהִנֵּ֡ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲמַרְיָ֣הוּ <S%H568><s%> And behold Amariah כֹהֵן֩ <S%H3548><s%> priest הָרֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the chief עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H5921><s%> will be over לְכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> [is] over you in all matters יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּזְבַדְיָ֨הוּ <S%H2069><s%> and Zebadiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשְׁמָעֵ֜אל <S%H3458><s%> of Ishmael הַנָּגִ֤יד <S%H5057><s%> the ruler לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> matters הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for all the king's וְשֹׁטְרִ֥ים <S%H7860><s%> [shall be] officers הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> also the Levites לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before חִזְק֣וּ <S%H2388><s%> courageously וַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> you Deal וִיהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> be with הַטּֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> shall be with the good פ
